summary: Tested all 3 bug fixes on Servex Holdings logistics app. S1 (sidebar flicker), S2 (invoice lock), and S3 (parcel search) all working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: No critical issues found. All 3 bug fixes implemented and verified.
Minor: DialogContent missing Description/aria-describedby warnings in console (cosmetic, doesn't affect functionality)
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test clients (TestClient Alpha, Bravo Logistics), 2 shipments, and 1 invoice (INV-2026-001 in 'sent' status) for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bugs verified fixed. Test data exists: 2 clients, 2 shipments, 1 sent invoice (INV-2026-001). Credentials: admin@servex.com / Servex2026!

test_results.S1_sidebar_flicker: PASS - Navigated Dashboard->Clients->Finance->Trips->Dashboard. Sidebar remained stable throughout, no remounting/flicker. Single nested Layout route structure working correctly.

S2_invoice_lock.draft_state: PASS - New invoice shows Save Draft and Finalize buttons, no lock banner
S2_invoice_lock.sent_state: PASS - INV-2026-001 (sent status) shows amber lock banner 'This invoice is Sent. Editing is locked.', Save Draft HIDDEN, Finalize HIDDEN, Download PDF VISIBLE, Record Payment VISIBLE, Request Edit Access VISIBLE

test_results.S3_parcel_search: PASS - Backend enriches shipments with client_name via batch fetch. Add Parcels modal shows parcels sorted by client name (Bravo Logistics, TestClient Alpha). Search by 'Alpha' returns 1 result, search by 'Bravo' returns 1 result, clear returns all 2 results.
